CustomField.description: Shows the SLA Status in much easier way / RO-659
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(tysosla__First_Touch_Due__c), "‚ö†Ô∏è Not Enough Info",
IF( AND(ISBLANK(tysosla__First_Touch__c), tysosla__First_Touch_Violation__c = False, tysosla__First_Touch_Due__c > NOW()), "üïì In Progress",
IF( tysosla__First_Touch_Violation__c = True, "‚ùå Missed SLA",
IF( OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(tysosla__First_Touch__c)), tysosla__First_Touch_Violation__c = False), AND(tysosla__First_Touch_Violation__c = False, tysosla__First_Touch_Due__c < NOW())), "‚úÖ Met SLA", "")
) ) )
CustomField.label: SLA
